Member Function Documentation

static CONTENTINFOMANAGERFACTORY_EXPORT ContentInfoManager* DRMPlugin::ContentInfoManagerFactory::GetContentInfoManager (  InfoManagerIndicator  flag,
IXMLElement *  xml,
DRMLogger &  logger
)  [static]
 

Create new content information manager .

Flag implies necessary XML document format. See specific content info manager documentation for correct format of XML document.

Parameters:
flag input, content info manager indicator.
xml input, XML document.
logger input-output, message logger.
Returns:
New content information manager . If fails, 0.
